website_summaries.verdict: If you're shopping for a child who loves Fingerlings and soft toys, this is a must-have to add to his or her collection.
pros: A plush version of the popular toy that makes several motions and sounds and can repeat phrases
Available in pink (Bella), purple (Kiki), and blue (Boris)
cons: Rare reports of toy not working upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: 3rd times a charm???
customer_reviews.text: How many Fingerlings HUGS does it take to work a week? Good question. I have had 2 so far and they haven't worked more than 24 hours. If they did work this would be one of the best gifts to give a child. I am assuming they have not worked out all the kinks. I will be asking for my 3rd Fingerling in hopes that it will work. My son and I love it when it works!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Destiney Bodnovich

customer_reviews.title: Smashed box
customer_reviews.text: The little guy is super cute. My niece will love it. My only complaint is the box was smashed and makes the gift look like it’s used. The amazon shipping box was fine which means the item was placed in the shipping box already smashed. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: FLAW - Ear button stops working after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Gave one to my son for Christmas and the ear button (used to activate and record) stopped working after a few weeks. Purchased a second one to substitute so I could return the first one and the ear button on the second one also stopped working. I give up (it was the record/repeat part that he loved!). Ordered another from the Amazon Warehouse and when it arrived, the buttons wasn't even working to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Lannes

customer_reviews.title: Won't work even with new batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my grandson and knew he would love it. It's not working even with new batteries. The window closed for me to return it because I had it for a gift. I bought it in July so it was still in the packaging and not used. Now it's not working at all. Maybe the company will help but I have no idea how to get ahold of them.
customer_reviews.author: BAG

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he absolutely loves this monkey. When it first arrived it kept saying one phrase we couldn't quite make out over and over, so we just put in new batteries and have had no problems since. It gives kisses, says "weeee" when you toss it in the air and several other phrases. My grandson is four and can't get enough of this monkey. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Demiku

customer_reviews.title: So excited!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. I am so excited! I also bought one for my daughter and my niece too. They have all wanted one, and I found them at great prices here on Amazon. They are big, and super soft. They say cute things too. I cannot wait for them to open these!
customer_reviews.author: KindleFirePrincess

customer_reviews.title: It farts!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for Christmas in 2018--it was the big hit for that year of all the presents my extended family of 13 gave. That's because I have five nephews and a niece, all age 9 and under, and they loved how it farted. They also enjoyed tossing it into the air to hear it puke upon landing. Well worth the money spent just to see the kids having so much fun with it. It does far more than just be a teddy bear--it's highly interactive, talks, makes sounds, and is soft and snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I know my little one will love it! He has the Boris fingerling that he still plays with and enjoys! I can’t wait to see him smile and play with the plush Boris when it’s Christmas time!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wood

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her fingerlings, borris is very interactive and makes her smile every time she plays with him, hes also soft and cuddly and often chosen for a snuggle buddy
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Funny cute little monkey but not for little one under three.
customer_reviews.text: I got those do these one for friend kids birthday and the other for my niece, he likes it but when the monkey hugs it’s gets tight which I think it’s not very safe for kids under three.
customer_reviews.author: Golden C

customer_reviews.title: Ear recording button stop working in a few days.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the ear recording function may be a problem. Some of the reviews mentioned that. I bought one for my son, it failed to function in a week. The replacement also stop to work today, only worked for 8 days. My son is so upset. I also bought a pink one for my daughter as Christmas gift from Target. The pink one has no any problem so far. So probably the blue has design problems and negatively effect the ear recording function.
customer_reviews.author: ooooo

customer_reviews.title: I received one that speaks Spanish?????
customer_reviews.text: I received one that speaks Spanish????? I did not order one that speaks Spanish and it NEVER stated I was buying one that speaks Spanish! No one in my family speaks Spanish!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part is the kissing sound, sooo cute! My son loved it! It actually missing some of the thinks mentioned in the instructions, not sure if it’s broken. But most of them worked. Overall, still worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Fanny

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: This will be a Christmas present for my grandson. The monkey is a nice size, is really cute, was packaged nicely, and arrived fast. Since it’s a Christmas Gift, I can’t review it as a toy yet, but I will update after Christmas. I do believe that he’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with nieces.
customer_reviews.text: These toys are a big hit with little girls, (ages 4-10) and I think boys younger than 8 would like them also. What is it about toys that burp and fart that kids like so much. The more the girls read the brochure the more they discovered about what fingerling hugs can do. Kids happy/I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie D.

customer_reviews.title: Ear playback broke or stopped working day 3
customer_reviews.text: My child loves her Boris, and his ear button broke or has something wrong with it. She snuggles him and loves him so much, so I have to order another one before I can return him. She’d be heartbroken. I got him for her 4th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for all the little kids in my life
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my daughter, and it was so cute that I reordered them for all the little kids in my family. They make everyone happy!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bittle

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay on and respond like I thought it would it does just not all the time...... I keep having it flip the switch up and down in order to get it to work.....
customer_reviews.author: Swowzers

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with young and old
customer_reviews.text: I bought Boris for my 2 yr old grandson's birthday. It was a hit with him and his older brothers-- ages 8 6,4. Bonus-- with all the sounds it makes it had the potential to be very annoying, but the volume is very tolerable. Super cute toy
customer_reviews.author: j. t.

customer_reviews.title: This Item is unwashable
customer_reviews.text: I received this item that came with lots of dark spot. Wanted to wash it before give it to my boy. However, I found out this Monkey Pet is unwashable so I have it returned.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very interactive, makes cute sounds!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved this. Very cute and makes the cutest sounds! It's soft and cuddly, and nice sized. We bought the blue one. Favorite Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Santa

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Way cuter than I expected. Makes noises by moving or putting in different positions not just pushing a button. The whole family laughs at this cute monkey.
customer_reviews.author: JGriggs

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My little one LOVES this! It's so cute! Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gray

customer_reviews.title: School Charity Gift Request
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift request at a local school charity - no idea how the toy works, but was very pleased with the speed it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: MFW

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: Just love him. Grandson gets that special hug from me. He also talks to him in my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler daughter loves playing with this. It’s so cute and makes adorable noises. A lot more fun than the original little fingerling toy.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandaughter for Christmas. It's very cute.
customer_reviews.author: bisson

customer_reviews.title: HUGE HIT WITH NIECES AND NEPHEW
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for my nieces and nephew, they absolutely loves them. well worth the money because of the smiles i got
customer_reviews.author: J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in a week.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in a week.. I ordered it through baby registry and used after a few weeks of receiving it so cannot be returned. Used it for a week. Although my baby was very attracted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought Boris for my 6 year old. She loves it and I love how versatile he is. Great for active play and cuddles too.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: New buddy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this monkey. It’s a little smaller than I imagined but that doesn’t bother him at all. It’s a very interactive toy that sings, whistles, blows kisses and more. The hands have Velcro on them to keep it hooked around your neck but my son doesn’t like it, he says it hurts but I’m sure he’s just being particular. Overall it’s a fun companion toy
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old absolutely loves this monkey. He's not even into stuffed animals but once he saw everything it can do he fell in love. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: christmas Happyness
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for all ages to included m y 94 Y/O grandmother in nursing home.. She loves it They just laugh and kiss you
customer_reviews.author: zilla

customer_reviews.title: Interactive toy and great toy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is to fun to have. Interactive and makes noise. Overall my kid likes this alot and has a special bonding with it.
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It was soft and my daughter loved it. Great battery life
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cute The 2 Weeks It Worked
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 7yr old son. He absolutely loved Boris for about 2 weeks! Then Boris quit working. Changes batteries, still didn’t work. Bought better quality batteries and tried again, still didn’t work! Very disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppinMama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome features!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a present for my son for Christmas and im so excited to see his expression when he opens it!!!! This is so worth the price and its bigger then i thought it would be which is a plus! Its amazing to see the eye lids will move and i did not expect that all! These are way better then the small fingerlings itself! Totally recomend this product for any child!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Jette

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 year old son is STILL in love with this from christmas (now almost march)
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer will back up their stuff
customer_reviews.text: Loved it as did my son but sensor in mouth got suck in kissing mode 4 months after giving it to him for 1st bday
customer_reviews.author: breanne smith

customer_reviews.title: Burp/fart machine
customer_reviews.text: I think the seller should emphasize that every other sound that comes from this monkey is a burp or a fart, it’s not an occasional phenomenon... not exactly what I wanted for my little girl
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. It’s the second large fingerling that he has. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy  Wienecke

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. However he chewed on the nose a bit and it got stuck making the kissing noise but if you cut it off then on again it fixes the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Fun and interactive
customer_reviews.text: SUper fun and very cute. It does burp and fart so if you don’t like that it won’t be a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved playing with the fingerlings toys and laugh again & again over the silly sounds and actions the toy makes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My nephew is going to love it. Fast shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: La Donna Meier

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, and blue. Just wish it did a bit more
customer_reviews.author: Letitia D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Ugly...cute monkey
customer_reviews.text: For me it looks ugly, but my baby love it...
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I ordered approximately 9 and all DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible. I bought them all on sale to donate and I did, and then I was told that NONE of them can be given out as Christmas gifts as NONE of them work. This is disgraceful.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, adorable product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Adorable and can’t wait to gift it for Christmas! I know my 5 year old will just love this!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: The monkey is so cute. My kids love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cute and love that it gives the kids kisses back. Having one place on the ear to press is nice and less confusing for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dirr

customer_reviews.title: Hug Monkey
customer_reviews.text: made a very happy customer for xmas ..she loves the stretch arms and it chats
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: We had this toy for 3 weeks and it stopped working. Replaced the batteries, tried to find solutions online, but there are no options. Now I’m stuck with a sad kiddo and a pile of garbage. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: T. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the ear button doesn’t work. Very disappointed. Bought in august as a Christmas gift. It’s past the return window now.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dies Fast
customer_reviews.text: Came not working. The tester didn’t work so I assumed it just needed new batteries. We insert new batteries and it works for a few minutes before it dies again. My son loves it when it’s working...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carter

customer_reviews.title: So much Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is almost two and my son who is four years old, both love this toy! It is a very interactive and funny toy!
customer_reviews.author: amanda woods

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun packed into that little blue monkey.  Added bonus was the price!
customer_reviews.text: Had to install batteries as ones included were dead but who cares! The toy is a riot as we could all laugh a little more, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I would like to return this item because on Christmas day it did not work. We tried everything and it did not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A.

customer_reviews.title: Broke just after the 90 day warranty
customer_reviews.text: Broke just after the 90 day warranty (stuck on the 'mmmmmmm'' noise). Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: flameboarder777

customer_reviews.title: Fingerlings Hugs Boris
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was very excited. He really enjoyed his surprise. It’s a toy that brings joy and laughter out of little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old for Christmas and she absolutely loves it... so sweet to hear her giggle when it kisses her.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne F

customer_reviews.title: Loved the fingerling
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with it. And price was awesome for everything it does. Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amy Allison

customer_reviews.title: Music not working after few days
customer_reviews.text: Its stopped working after few days ... we changed batteries also but no use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he's too cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is four and she truly love this monkey, the interaction he has with her is like having a pet.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting!! On time!! My kids love it!! Recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leislany

customer_reviews.title: Product should be tested before sending to customers.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product yesterday it doesn’t make noises this product is defective I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Misy

customer_reviews.title: Kids Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 5 years old, love the motion and fun interactive. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Liao

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these it Christmas gifts and neither of them work!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi H.

customer_reviews.title: It didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work at all. Huge disappointment. My daughters heart was broken this was suppose to be her birthday gift. She couldnt even play with it.
customer_reviews.author: stefan Metzger

product_meta.title: Fingerlings HUGS - Boris (Blue) - Advanced Interactive Plush Baby Monkey Pet - by WowWee
product_meta.description: Meet Fingerlings HUGS - they’re softies when it comes to affection! Their long arms are perfect for big hugs and these cuddle monkeys never want to let you go! It's all about that Main Squeeze Fingerlings feeling. Swing them, pet them, and rock them to sleep, or give them a kiss and watch them kiss you back!! Record what you say and watch them repeat it back in funny ways.
feature_bullets: Meet Fingerlings HUGS - they’re softies when it comes to affection! Their long arms are perfect for big hugs and these cuddle monkeys never want to let you go!
They’ll have supersized reactions to all of your actions. From burps to toots to laughs, there’s never a dull moment!
Your HUGS will show you how excited they are when you throw them in the air, swing them, tickle them and turn them upside down!
Your sweet monkey loves nothing more than to give you some TLC! Press their mouth to your skin to get a kiss. The longer you hold it, the longer the kiss will last. Mwaaaaah!
Want to laugh out loud? Press and hold your HUGS’ left ear while you talk. When you let go, your HUGS will repeat what you say in funny ways! They’ll never stop monkeying around!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars365 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
